monsters.name: Dire Wolf
monsters.description: A massive wolf, larger and more ferocious than its cave-dwelling cousins.

attacks.name: Bite
attacks.description: The dire wolf's massive jaws clamp down with crushing force.

specialAbilities.name: Pack Tactics
specialAbilities.description: Advantage on attack rolls if an ally is within 5 feet of target.

specialAbilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
specialAbilities.description: Advantage on Perception checks using hearing or smell.

flavorText: A howl pierces the air - a dire wolf emerges, larger than any you've seen!
The alpha predator has arrived. A dire wolf fixes you with its gaze!
Massive paws thunder across the ground as a dire wolf charges!
monsters.defeatedText: The dire wolf's howl fades as it collapses, defeated.

monsters.name: Woolly Mammoth
monsters.description: A towering beast covered in thick fur, with massive curved tusks.

attacks.name: Stomp
attacks.description: A massive foot comes crashing down!

specialAbilities.name: Trampling Charge
specialAbilities.description: If moves 20+ feet toward creature and hits with gore, target must succeed DC 18 STR save or be knocked prone.

flavorText: The ground shakes! A woolly mammoth trumpets a challenge!
An enormous shadow looms - a mammoth, tusks gleaming!
The smell of musk and fur - a mammoth charges!
monsters.defeatedText: The mighty mammoth falls like a collapsing mountain, its tusks digging into the earth.

monsters.name: Stone Age Shaman
monsters.description: A tribal spellcaster who channels primal magic through bones and blood.

attacks.name: Bone Staff
attacks.description: A staff adorned with bones and feathers strikes!

specialAbilities.name: Primal Spellcasting
specialAbilities.description: Can cast: Produce Flame, Cure Wounds, Entangle, Thunderwave. Spell save DC 13, +5 to hit.

specialAbilities.name: Ancestor's Guidance
specialAbilities.description: Once per combat, grant ally advantage on next attack or save.

flavorText: Chanting fills the air - a shaman emerges, eyes glowing with power!
Bones rattle and the air crackles with primal magic!
A painted figure begins weaving mystical patterns in the air!
monsters.defeatedText: The shaman's chanting ceases as they collapse, their spirits departing.

monsters.name: Cave Bear
monsters.description: A massive, aggressive bear that makes its den in dark caverns.

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.description: Massive claws swipe with devastating force!

specialAbilities.name: Keen Smell
specialAbilities.description: Advantage on Perception checks using smell.

flavorText: A thunderous roar echoes! A massive cave bear emerges!
The stench of bear musk fills your nostrils - it attacks!
You've entered a bear's territory - and it's not happy!
monsters.defeatedText: The great bear's roar fades to silence as it collapses.

monsters.name: Giant Elk
monsters.description: An enormous elk with a majestic rack of antlers, fiercely territorial.

attacks.name: Ram
attacks.description: The elk lowers its massive antlers and charges!

specialAbilities.name: Charge
specialAbilities.description: If moves 20+ feet straight and hits with ram, target takes extra 2d6 damage and must succeed DC 14 STR save or be knocked prone.

flavorText: A magnificent giant elk paws the ground, ready to defend its territory!
Antlers like trees - a giant elk bellows a challenge!
The thunder of hooves - a giant elk charges at full speed!
monsters.defeatedText: The giant elk stumbles and falls, its majestic antlers touching the earth one last time.

monsters.name: Stone Age Hunter
monsters.description: An expert tracker and hunter, armed with atlatl and stone-tipped spears.

attacks.name: Atlatl Spear
attacks.description: A spear hurls through the air with deadly accuracy!

attacks.name: Stone Knife
attacks.description: A sharp stone blade slashes out!

specialAbilities.name: Hunter's Mark
specialAbilities.description: First attack each combat has advantage.

specialAbilities.name: Evasive
specialAbilities.description: When attacked by ranged weapon, can use reaction to gain +2 AC.

flavorText: A skilled hunter emerges from concealment, weapon ready!
You've been tracked! A stone age hunter attacks!
Silent and deadly - a hunter's spear flies toward you!
monsters.defeatedText: The hunter falls, their tracking days over.

monsters.name: Terror Bird
monsters.description: A massive flightless predatory bird with a powerful beak and talons.

attacks.name: Beak
attacks.description: A massive hooked beak strikes like a pickaxe!

specialAbilities.name: Pounce
specialAbilities.description: If moves 30+ feet straight toward target and hits, target must succeed DC 14 STR save or be knocked prone.

specialAbilities.name: Aggressive
specialAbilities.description: As bonus action, can move up to speed toward hostile creature it can see.

flavorText: A shriek splits the air - a terror bird races toward you on powerful legs!
Eight feet tall and furious - a terror bird attacks!
The ground shakes as a prehistoric predator bird charges!
monsters.defeatedText: The terror bird's shriek dies as it crashes to the ground.
